name: Pooja Rani
text: This Pizza Hut store is nice and cozy, they serve fresh and hot pizza. Thin crust and pan pizza is the best from this place. And the staff is nice and friendly. They also send plenty of coupons in mail.

text: I'm only rating 2 stars because the pizza was so smacking Delicious. But we got here around 6:30 pm. Sat at the table for about 15 minutes before we even got a menu. There was littler two other people in here. After getting the menu and ‚Ä¶More

text: I work across the street from them so this is a frequent lunch spot for me.  I have to say the server her name is Ray is phenomenal. She is a workaholic and provides an unbelievable level of service. Very friendly and warm environment and no complaints about the food either. Try their wings they're really good.

name: William Rohde
text: They offer personal pan, 8 pc boneless wings or pasta for 5 bucks during lunch.  The boneless wings I chose were excellent. Usually do buffets but not that crazy over pizza. The specials also come with 4 large fresh baked bread sticks.  Great weekday lunch spot.

text: One of the few pizza places where they do not overload your pizza with a sea of marinara sauce. Also tastes good! Fan of their garlic knots.
